Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a grey-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted Greek (?) text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394154) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394154)
